name: Car SK
description:
Race around Australia in this two-player (party) game created exclusively for Melbourne's bar/gallery space Bar SK. Celebrating their first-year anniversary, Beer SK is a two-week exhibition running 31 August - 13 September 2017.

COME JOIN IN THE FUN!

This game was created during the Beer SK week-long jam. The following restrictions applied:

  • Two Players
  • Two Buttons per player (A&S player 1, K&L player 2)
  • Short playtime (less than 5 mins)
  • [Some other technical restrictions.]

Bear in mind, ANY KEY refers to either A, S, K or L.

There are plans for 6 destinations yet, for now, there are only 3 accessible.

(As this is for a (noisy) bar there are no sounds other than the noises that you make -- meep meep!)
